item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH beginning 4pm for
the New Years Weekend! We've had good conditions so far this year so come
on up and ring in the new year by taking some runs at one of the many
mountains near the house.

We are about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Bretton Woods,
Cranmore, and Black Mountain. Even Sunday River is only about 40 minutes
away.

Guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fee. Once you RSVP full
directions and information will follow.


Members and guests must be 21+
item.name: New Years Eve at the Bretts
